Name: Ars Arma CPC MOD.2 plate carrier
Description: The second generation of modification of the CPC body armor designed by Crye Precision and adapted by Ars Arms for use by special forces of the Russian Federation. This modular body armor is based on a polymer corset that fits the body, which avoids the backlash of the body arm during active movement and also contributes to a evener distribution of weight. Made in the assault configuration of pouches and armor elements.
